foreignData.name: Vollmacht // Vollstrecker
foreignData.text: Erzeuge einen 4/4 weißen und blauen Sphinx-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit und Wachsamkeit.

foreignData.name: Detención // Defensor
foreignData.text: Crea una ficha de criatura Esfinge blanca y azul 4/4 con las habilidades de volar y vigilancia.

foreignData.name: Procuration // Protègement
foreignData.text: Créez un jeton de créature 4/4 blanche et bleue Sphinx avec le vol et la vigilance.

foreignData.name: Diffida // Difensore
foreignData.text: Crea una pedina creatura Sfinge 4/4 bianca e blu con volare e cautela.

foreignData.name: 万全 // 番人
foreignData.text: 飛行と警戒を持ち白であり青である４/４のスフィンクス・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。

foreignData.name: 영장 // 교도관
foreignData.text: 비행 및 경계를 가진 4/4 백색 및 청색 스핑크스 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignData.name: Permissão // Proteção
foreignData.text: Crie uma ficha de criatura branca e azul 4/4 do tipo Esfinge com voar e vigilância.

foreignData.name: Ордер // Охранник
foreignData.text: Создайте одну фишку существа 4/4 белый и синий Сфинкс с Полетом и Бдительностью.

foreignData.name: 看管 // 看护
foreignData.text: 派出一个4/4，白蓝双色，具飞行与警戒异能的史芬斯衍生生物。

foreignData.name: 看管 // 看護
foreignData.text: 派出一個4/4，白藍雙色，具飛行與警戒異能的史芬斯衍生生物。

name: Warrant // Warden
originalText: Create a 4/4 white and blue Sphinx creature token with flying and vigilance.

rulings.text: An “attacking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker or put onto the battlefield attacking during this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat. Similarly, a “blocking creature” is one that has been declared as a blocker or put onto the battlefield blocking during this combat.

text: Create a 4/4 white and blue Sphinx creature token with flying and vigilance.
